= Description List Styles

== Ordered Style

[ordered]
First:: Definition one
Second:: Definition two
Third:: Definition three

== Unordered Style

[unordered]
Alpha:: Value A
Beta:: Value B

== Combined Style and Role

[ordered.highlight]
Item One:: With role
Item Two:: And style

== Plain Description List

Plain Term:: No style applied
Another Term:: Uses hdlist1 class

== Role Only

[.custom-role]
Styled Term:: Has role but no marker style
